original_title: Senehase Yathrawa on for the second day
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Senehase Yathrawa organized by the National Movement for a Radical Change will take place for the second day on Thursday (20).
The Senehase Yathrawa will reach Colombo from six locations on Thursday (20) including Kegalle, Matara, Puttalam, Anuradhapura, Bibile and Embilipitiya.
Convener of the National Movement for a Radical Change Maheel Bandara said the Senehase Yathrawa successfully commenced from Kandy, Kataragama, Batticaloa, Mannar and Jaffna on Wednesday (19).
He said the Senehase Yathrawa also aims to build reconciliation among all communities and against various attempts to obstruct democracy.
The Senehase Yathrawa is expected to reach Colombo on Friday (21) and a rally is to take place at Hyde Park at 6 PM the same day.
